001
002package com.commercetools.api.models;
003
004import java.util.Collection;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Map;
007
008import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiMethod;
009import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ClientRequestCommand;
010import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.RequestCommand;
011
012@Deprecated
013/**
014 * Interface with common methods for query endpoints
015 * @param <T> the type of the underlying request
016 * @param <TResult> the type of the underlying result model, like category or product.
017 * @deprecated use com.commercetools.api.client.PagedQueryResourceRequest instead
018 */
019public interface PagedQueryResourceRequest<T extends PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult>, TResult>
020        extends RequestCommand<TResult>, ClientRequestCommand<TResult> {
021    <TValue> PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> withLimit(final TValue limit);
022
023    <TValue> PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> addLimit(final TValue limit);
024
025    <TValue> PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> withOffset(final TValue offset);
026
027    <TValue> PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> addOffset(final TValue offset);
028
029    <TValue> PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> withSort(final TValue sort);
030
031    <TValue> PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> addSort(final TValue sort);
032
033    <TValue> PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> withWhere(final TValue where);
034
035    <TValue> PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> addWhere(final TValue where);
036
037    <TValue> PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> withExpand(final TValue expand);
038
039    <TValue> PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> addExpand(final TValue expand);
040
041    <TValue> PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> withWithTotal(final TValue withTotal);
042
043    <TValue> PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> addWithTotal(final TValue withTotal);
044
045    <TValue> PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> withPredicateVar(final String varName, final TValue predicateVar);
046
047    <TValue> PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> addPredicateVar(final String varName, final TValue predicateVar);
048
049    <TValue> PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> withPredicateVar(final String varName,
050            final Collection<TValue> predicateVar);
051
052    <TValue> PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> addPredicateVar(final String varName,
053            final Collection<TValue> predicateVar);
054
055    List<ApiMethod.ParamEntry<String, String>> getQueryParams();
056
057    List<String> getQueryParam(final String key);
058
059    String getFirstQueryParam(final String key);
060
061    default PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> asPagedQueryResourceRequest() {
062        return this;
063    }
064
065    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
066    default T withWhere(final String where, final String predicateVar, final String predicateVarValue) {
067        return (T) withWhere(where).withPredicateVar(predicateVar, predicateVarValue);
068    }
069
070    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
071    default T addWhere(final String where, final String predicateVar, final String predicateVarValue) {
072        return (T) addWhere(where).withPredicateVar(predicateVar, predicateVarValue);
073    }
074
075    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
076    default T withWhere(final String where, final Map<String, Collection<String>> predicateVar) {
077        PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> request = withWhere(where);
078        predicateVar.forEach(request::withPredicateVar);
079        return (T) request;
080    }
081
082    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
083    default T addWhere(final String where, final Map<String, Collection<String>> predicateVar) {
084        PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> request = addWhere(where);
085        predicateVar.forEach(request::withPredicateVar);
086        return (T) request;
087    }
088
089    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
090    default T withWhere(final String where, final Collection<Map.Entry<String, String>> predicateVar) {
091        PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> request = withWhere(where);
092        predicateVar.forEach(pair -> request.withPredicateVar(pair.getKey(), pair.getValue()));
093        return (T) request;
094    }
095
096    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
097    default T addWhere(final String where, final Collection<Map.Entry<String, String>> predicateVar) {
098        PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> request = addWhere(where);
099        predicateVar.forEach(pair -> request.withPredicateVar(pair.getKey(), pair.getValue()));
100        return (T) request;
101    }
102
103    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
104    default T asPagedQueryResourceRequestToBaseType() {
105        return (T) this;
106    }
107}
